snippet: The battle for control of the water utility Severn Trent continued after the investment group that offered $8.2 billion to buy the company said it would walk away unless Severn Trent entered into discussions.
abstract: The battle for control of the water utility Severn Trent continued after the investment group that offered $8.2 billion to buy the company said it would walk away unless Severn Trent entered into discussions.

headline.main: Bidders for British Utility Threaten to Walk Away from $8.2 Billion Offer
